item.title: Bear in Mind #1: Platform Engineering
item.description: At MetalBear we build open-source dev tools for backend developers, which puts our domain at the intersection of some pretty interesting topics. There’s still a lot of great content being written about things that aren’t AI - things like Kubernetes, DevEx, Open Source, Rust, and more - and we go through a lot of it as part of our daily work. How easy it would then be, we collectively thought, to provide our growing community of curious but busy backend developers with a periodic, curated list of our favorite pieces of writing on these topics?
